entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
